info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:50PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Hampshire and central Hampden Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 450 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Huntington, or 9 miles northwest of Westfield, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Westfield, Holyoke, Amherst, Northampton, West Springfield, Ludlow, South Hadley, Easthampton, Belchertown, Wilbraham, Palmer, Granby, Southampton, Hadley, Hampden, Huntington, Russell and Westhampton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
